location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Nicholas Hankey Smith, Resident at Bushire to Neil Benjamin Edmonstone, Secretary in the Secret, Political and Foreign Department, Fort William, Calcutta

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The item has suffered from pest damage, resulting in two large holes in f 24 which obscure significant amounts of text in the body of the letter and make some of the text difficult to read.

mods.abstract: The letter is forwarding copies of correspondence (not present) relating to his dispute with Samuel Manesty over the Resident of Bushire's application for a cruizer. It also explains why he has refused the proposal of employing Manesty's private vessels instead.
